title: Marketplace for 08/09/13
byline: David Weinberg, Sarah McCammon, Lizzie O'Leary, Sabri Ben-Achour, Ben Bergman and Jim Burress
teaser: Two encryption email providers -- one of which Snowden supposedly used -- are closing up shop. One of the companies put out a statement implying that the Feds were making requests, and analysts believe the firm decided to shut down rather than abide by requests secretly. And it's Friday, so we review the week that was on Wall Street in the Weekly Wrap, including major settlements and lawsuits for big banks and worries about the Fed and monetary policy.
